name: 20 Seconds Memory!
description:
Status: Playtesting

Train your brains with this simple memory game! Select your IQ, are you a monkey, human or robot?!  Each icon has two cards. Memorize them and flip each set. Do it within 20 seconds and you win! 

This little game is my submission for the "20 Second Game Jam". Its my second game and first time participating in a jam! Since I am just a beginner this was a perfect jam. A small scope so easy to finish. I learned alot while making this game. I did the art, programming and sound (yes I reallyrecords a card deck lol) myself, while its far from perfect, it whas alot of fun making it!

I used the following software:

  • Unity
  • Krita
  • Aseprite
  • LMMS
  • Audacity

More info on the jam: 20 Second Game Jam - itch.io
